Welcome!!!

I am a research scholar at IIT Bombay. My current area of research is smoothed particle hydrodynamics, meshless methods, and the method of manufactured solutions (MMS). My current work is on the construction of MMS for weakly-compressible SPH schemes.

Apart from these, I have an interest in Wavelet-based solution of partial differential equations, Machine learning, and deep learning.
